welcome_message_body: Welcome to Glen Burnie, where small-town charm meets big-city energy. Known for its beautiful parks, historic sites, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that Glen Burnie has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at BWI airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A primarily serves Southwest Airlines and is connected to the main terminal.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B primarily serves American Airlines and is connected to the main terminal.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C serves various airlines and is connected to the main terminal.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lee Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Glenn L Martin Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
